item.name: fullDesc
item.label: Full Description
item.tooltip: The description should be as rich as possible. If applicable, include: the scope; details of what is being studied or recorded; methodologies used, information about any instruments that were used to produce and/or collect the data; relevant standards used; conditions under which the study or research occured or the data was collected, etc If there were any problems or other issues with methods used to produce and/or collect the data, please include those as well.

item.name: anzforSubject
item.label: Fields of Research
item.tooltip:
Include Fields of Research terms and corresponding classification codes to be associated with the resource being described. The Fields of Research Classfication can be found at the following URL.
http://www.arc.gov.au/applicants/codes.htm#FOR

item.name: anzseoSubject
item.label: Socio-Economic Objective
item.tooltip:
Include terms and corresponding classification codes to be associated with the resource being described. Information on the Socio-Economic Objectives Classication Codes can be found at the following URL.
http://www.arc.gov.au/applicants/codes.htm#SEO

item.name: locSubject
item.label: Keywords
item.tooltip:
Record keywords describing the data. 5-10 keywords will normally be sufficient. The keywords must be specific enough for researchers with similar interests to find your data.
If you need assistance in selecting keywords, there are many thesauri that may be helpful. Please use one appropriate to your discipline. If you are unable to identify a discipline specific classification scheme, you may wish to use the Library of Congress Classification scheme available at http://www.loc.gov/catdir/cpso/lcco/

item.name: anztoaSubject
item.label: Type of Research Activity
item.tooltip: If appropriate, assign a research activity classficiation. There are four set values that can be assigned. Please choose one.
